ssa-extra-help.title: Extra Help with Medicare Prescription Drug Plan Costs
ssa-extra-help.headline: Extra Help with Medicare Prescription Drug Plan Costs
ssa-extra-help.source.name: Social Security Administration
ssa-extra-help.summary: If you are enrolled in a Medicare Prescription Drug plan, you may be able to get extra help to pay for the monthly premiums, annual deductibles, and co-payments related to the Medicare Prescription Drug program.
ssa-extra-help.criticalApplicationInform: A single SSA benefit application will be used to apply to all SSA benefits, but eligibility and approval will be determined for individual benefits.
ssa-extra-help.eligibility.label: You are at least 65 years old or disabled.
